programme.title: Lord of War, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: Oscar winner Nicolas Cage stars in this taut, action-packed tale of a notorious arms dealer who sold weapons to dictators and successfully outran the law for nearly twenty years.

programme.title: Thief, (1981, Crime)
programme.desc: Michael Mann directs this stylishly photographed action-packed drama that stars James Caan as a master safe cracker who is planning his last heist for the sake of a woman (Tuesday Weld).

programme.title: The Untouchables, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: This confrontation between good and evil stars Kevin Costner as federal agent Eliot Ness, Robert De Niro as gangland kingpin Al Capone, and Sean Connery as Malone, the cop who teaches Ness how to beat the mob: shoot fast and shoot first.

programme.title: The Thomas Crown Affair, (1999, Thriller)
programme.desc: An adventure of a millionaire playboy who steals a priceless work of art and then strikes up a fiery romance with the brilliant female insurance investigator who is on to his game.

programme.title: Life of Crime, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: A pampered housewife (Jennifer Aniston) is kidnapped by a pair of blundering ex-cons in an effort to extort money from her sleazy real-estate tycoon husband (Tim Robbins).

programme.title: Get Shorty, (1995, Comedy)
programme.desc: Golden Globe® winner John Travolta stars with Gene Hackman, Danny DeVito and Rene Russo in this wildly popular comedy of a gangster who turns into a big-time producer after he travels to Hollywood to collect a debt from a down-and-out filmmaker.

programme.title: The Untouchables, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: This confrontation between good and evil stars Kevin Costner as federal agent Eliot Ness, Robert De Niro as gangland kingpin Al Capone, and Sean Connery as Malone, the cop who teaches Ness how to beat the mob: shoot fast and shoot first.

programme.title: 3000 Miles to Graceland, (2001, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Posing as Elvis impersonators, ex-convicts rob a Las Vegas casino during an Elvis Presley fan convention, but greed and dissention among them ultimately lead to betrayal and chaos.

programme.title: Bernie, (2012, Dark Humor & Black Comedies)
programme.desc: In small-town Texas, an affable mortician (Jack Black, "School of Rock") strikes up a friendship with a wealthy widow, who soon becomes controlling.

programme.title: The Station Agent, (2003, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: A loner with a passion for trains inherits an empty train station in the middle of nowhere. He encounters unexpected neighbors and with absolutely nothing in common, they form a friendship none of them could foresee.

programme.title: Saved!, (2004, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Good girl Mary (Jena Malone) can't believe it when she gets pregnant by her newly-gay boyfriend. She also can't believe the actions of her popular, relentlessly devout best friend, Hilary Faye (Mandy Moore).

programme.title: Adventureland, (2009, Screwball)
programme.desc: From the director of SUPERBAD comes a coming-of-age comedy of big dreams, hysterical consequences, and young love, set in a run-down amusement park.

programme.title: Man in the Moon, (1991, Romance)
programme.desc: The heartwarming coming-of-age film set in the 1950s stars Reese Witherspoon as a 14-year-old girl who gets her first difficult lesson in love.

programme.title: The Importance of Being Earnest, (2002, Romance)
programme.desc: From the hilarious adventure by Oscar Wilde comes this tale of two dashing young bachelors and the outrageous deceptions they find themselves in over love, starring Reese Witherspoon, Colin Firth, and Rupert Everett.

programme.title: Penelope, (2008, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: She's young, she's rich, she's available - too bad she has a pig's nose. Christina Ricci and James McAvoy team in a modern fairy tale about finding perfect love, imperfections and all.

programme.title: Adventureland, (2009, Screwball)
programme.desc: From the director of SUPERBAD comes a coming-of-age comedy of big dreams, hysterical consequences, and young love, set in a run-down amusement park.

programme.title: Hot Summer Nights, (2018, Crime)
programme.desc: An awkward teenager gets in over his head dealing drugs while falling for his business partner's enigmatic sister during one scorching summer in Cape Cod, Massachusetts.

programme.title: Rambling Rose, (1991, Drama)
programme.desc: A confused and over-sexed young woman is taken in by a respectable Southern family. She is warmly received but trouble begins when she cannot control her sexual desires.

programme.title: Citizen Ruth, (1996, Dark Humor & Black Comedies)
programme.desc: In this outrageous satire, Laura Dern is Ruth Stoops, an irresponsible, care-free drug addict pregnant for the fifth time, horrifying everyone around her. Soon, Ruth's at the forefront of a national debate, when all she wants to do is party.

programme.title: The First Wives Club, (1996, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Join the Club - The First Wives Club, the good-time battle-of-the-sexes satire sparked by snappy one-liners, great physical-comedy gags and three unforgettable stars in top form, Bette Midler, Goldie Hawn and Diane Keaton.

programme.title: Mrs. Winterbourne, (1996, Romance)
programme.desc: This fast-paced comedy follows the story of eighteen-year-old Connie Doyle an expectant mother with no money and an uncertain future.

programme.title: Rambling Rose, (1991, Drama)
programme.desc: A confused and over-sexed young woman is taken in by a respectable Southern family. She is warmly received but trouble begins when she cannot control her sexual desires.

programme.title: The First Wives Club, (1996, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Join the Club - The First Wives Club, the good-time battle-of-the-sexes satire sparked by snappy one-liners, great physical-comedy gags and three unforgettable stars in top form, Bette Midler, Goldie Hawn and Diane Keaton.

programme.title: Fools Rush In, (1997, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Matthew Perry stars as Alex Whitman, a New Yorker sent to Las Vegas to oversee a construction project. There he meets Isabel Fuentes, and some serious chemistry brings them together for one night. Rating: PG-13

programme.title: Ghost, (1990, Romance)
programme.desc: Patrick Swayze plays a ghost who teams with a psychic (Whoopi Goldberg) to uncover the truth behind his murder — and to rescue his sweetheart (Demi Moore) from a similar fate.

programme.title: Scream, Blacula, Scream!, (1973, Cult Horror)
programme.desc: Brought back to the world of the living by a voodoo ceremony Blacula (William Marshall) is loosed with insatiable bloodlust upon the population of a small community in the Louisiana back country. Pam Grier also stars in this scintillating sequel

programme.title: The Amityville Horror, (1979, Horror Classics)
programme.desc: Supposed true story about the Lutzm family whose dream house turns into a nightmare. The unsuspecting new tenants of a house whose previous occupants had been murdered in their sleep.

programme.title: When a Stranger Calls, (1979, Horror Classics)
programme.desc: A psychopathic killer terrorizes a babysitter, then returns seven years later to menace her again.

programme.title: Annie Hall, (1977, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Woody Allen is in prime form in this celebrated comedy and 1977 Best Picture Oscar®-winner in which he portrays a highly neurotic comedy writer who falls head-over-heels in love with a naive small-town girl (Diane Keaton) who aspires to be a singer.

programme.title: Everything You Always Wanted to Know About Sex * But Were Afraid to Ask, (1972, Comedy)
programme.desc: Woody Allen heads up an amazing cast including Gene Wilder, Tony Randall and Lynn Redgrave, in several hysterical vignettes that spoof the unorthodox joys of sex.

programme.title: White Lightning, (1973, Action)
programme.desc: In one of his most memorable roles, Burt Reynolds portrays a moonshine whiskey runner who turns state's witness to avenge the murder of a boy no one understood.

programme.title: Gator, (1976, Action)
programme.desc: The Feds want Gator McKlusky (Burt Reynolds) to go undercover to expose a local crime boss and former boyhood pal, Bama McCall. When Gator discovers Bama is involved in extortion, prostitution, and murder, the suspense builds to an explosive climax!

programme.title: Semi-Tough, (1977, Comedy)
programme.desc: Barbara Jane (Jill Clayburgh), Billy Clyde (Burt Reynolds) and Shake (Kris Kristofferson) have been best friends for years. But when Barbara Jane's new interest in Shake turns into love, Billy Clyde realizes she's the woman he’s wanted all along!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Pets Peeved
programme.desc: When Yuma's Heart Pieces are swiped by a pack of stray dogs, Cathy calls on her feline friends to help hunt them down. After finding the hounds' hideout, Cathy is challenged by the pack leader to a duel.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: About Hart
programme.desc: After using his powers to escape from Heartland City, Hart unleashes a path of destruction that only Yuma can help stop!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Losing Hart
programme.desc: As Kite desperately searches for his brother, Vetrix puts his diabolical plan for revenge in motion.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: A Dubious Duo
programme.desc: Vetrix continues his quest to drain Hart of all his powers.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: The Dragon Awakens
programme.desc: Kite must learn to work with Yuma if he wants to take down Trey and Quattro and rescue Hart. Can Kite put his pride aside and accept Yuma’s help, or will Kite’s ego end up sacrificing Hart’s safety?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Rock and a Hard Place
programme.desc: Faced with tough decisions, Yuma decides to run away from his problems and search for his father until Master Roku confronts him, forcing him to face a few hard truths.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Ruffled Feathers
programme.desc: The race for entry into the World Duel Carnival sees Nistro clash with TV superhero The Sparrow.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Family Leave
programme.desc: Trey makes an unexpected visit to Yuma’s house and discovers the secret behind Yuma’s incredible dueling skills.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Sky's the Limit
programme.desc: After accepting Trey’s challenge to a duel, Yuma soon learns that Trey has acquired a dark and dangerous new power.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Exit: Astral
programme.desc: With the bond between Astral and Yuma broken, Trey takes aim at the rest of Yuma’s life points.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Crestfallen
programme.desc: The back-and-forth battle between Trey and Yuma reaches its climactic conclusion! Can Yuma defeat Trey without Astral’s assistance or will Trey triumph, leaving Yuma one Heart Piece short of making it to the finals?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Party Panic
programme.desc: Yuma and his friends get all decked out for the event of the year - the World Duel Carnival Finals party! But when Yuma forgets his invite, can he find a way into the festivities, or will he be forced to hit the road and head home early?!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Roller Duel!
programme.desc: It’s time for the World Duel Carnival Finals! But prepare for a world of twists and turns because the finalists will be dueling on a roller coaster! Can Yuma handle the ups and downs of the competition, or will he be sent for a loop?!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Roller Coaster Rampage!
programme.desc: To assess Yuma’s dueling skills, Vetrix hires the Triad of Terror, a trio of cunning card sharks, to triple team him! Yuma better figure out a way to roll through this threesome before his dueling goes off the rails!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Test Your Luck!
programme.desc: The World Duel Carnival takes a dark turn as the finalists descend into the Dragon’s Den – a dark and dangerous duel track that will bring defeat for many a duelist!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Welcome to the Jungle
programme.desc: The heat's on when Vetrix and Dextra duel in the jungle to decide who moves on to the World Duel Carnival semifinals!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Portal of Doom
programme.desc: Quinton takes a timeout during his duel against Kite to reveal the long-hidden mystery about Yuma’s father’s disappearance!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Cosmic Chaos
programme.desc: Quinton and Kite’s confrontation in the cosmos comes to a climactic conclusion!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Depths of Darkness
programme.desc: Shark finally faces off with his archenemy, Quattro! Will Shark get his long awaited revenge, or will he end up sleeping with the fishes?!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Swimming with Sharks
programme.desc: It’s the cataclysmic conclusion between Shark and Quattro! If Shark doesn’t make a comeback from the depths of defeat, not only is he out of the tournament, but his quest for justice will go unserved!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Rockin’ and Rollin’
programme.desc: There’s chaos in the canyon when Yuma duels Nistro to see who will get the last spot in the World Duel Carnival semifinals! Can Yuma dodge defeat in the desert, or is Nistro destined to rock Yuma's world?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Doctor Visit
programme.desc: When Yuma’s deck goes missing, he and the gang set out to look for it! But when their search leads them to Heartland City, they end up finding much more than they bargained for!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Duel of Destiny: Part 1
programme.desc: Yuma sets his sights on reeling in Shark in the first battle of the semifinals, but when his foe starts off dueling like a guppy, Yuma questions if he’s being baited! Does Yuma learn this far too late to escape a sinister Shark attack?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Duel of Destiny: Part 2
programme.desc: This is it! Yuma’s jaw-dropping duel against Shark in the World Duel Carnival semifinals draws to a finish! Can Yuma rise above his razor-sharp rival, or will he be dragged down to the depths of defeat?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: The Hart of the Matter
programme.desc: The mighty masked duelist Vetrix faces off against the Number Hunter Kite! Unfortunately for Kite, Vetrix springs a shocking surprise that makes dueling all but impossible!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Change of Hart
programme.desc: The explosive end to the battle between Kite and Vetrix roars to a finish! As the battle climaxes, Yuma sets out to free Kite’s brother Hart from Vetrix’s grasp, while Kite duels knowing full well that Hart’s safety hangs in the balance!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Sphere of Fear: Part 1
programme.desc: It all comes down to this! Yuma squares off against Vetrix in a battle that will determine the first ever World Duel Carnival Champion!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Sphere of Fear: Part 2
programme.desc: As the duel between Vetrix and Yuma races to its cataclysmic conclusion, Yuma stares down defeat and comes face-to-face with Vetrix’s shocking secret!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Sphere of Fear: Part 3
programme.desc: This is it! The earth-shattering ending of Yuma’s duel against Vetrix! Can Yuma rise above Vetrix’s unrelenting onslaught, or will he meet defeat and lose everything he holds dear – his soul, his Numbers and… Astral?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: The Countdown Begins
programme.desc: Yuma learns the details of Dr. Faker’s diabolical plan to destroy Astral World! Can Yuma figure out a way to stop Faker, or is the future of Astral World a thing of the past?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: A Trio’s Challenge: Part 1
programme.desc: Kite, Shark and Yuma join forces to take down Dr. Faker! Can this trio work together as a team and put an end to Faker’s fury, or will Faker and his deck prove to be too much of a challenge for these three fearless friends?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: A Trio’s Challenge: Part 2
programme.desc: With the fate of Astral World hanging in the balance, Yuma, Kite and Shark set their sights on stopping Dr. Faker, but before our three heroes can make their final move, Dr. Faker reveals the shocking reason behind his diabolical plan!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: A Trio’s Challenge: Part 3
programme.desc: When a mysterious being from Barian World appears, Yuma, Kite and Shark must work together and battle like never before if they want to save Hart, Astral World… and themselves!

programme.title: Chopper and Robin risk their own lives in a desperate attempt to save Luffy and Zoro from a monstrous wall of water! Meanwhile, Sanji moves ever closer to a reunion with Robin.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Nami's soul cries out! Straw hat luffy makes a comeback!

programme.title: Luffy and Nami ask to borrow a ship so they can chase down the sea train, but the weather is too severe to set sail. Lucky for them, Iceberg and his friends are full of surprises!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Another sea train? Rocketman charges forth!

programme.title: Luffy, Zoro, Chopper, and Nami rocket toward a rendezvous with the assassins of CP 9, but they’ll need to forge an alliance with some new friends to have any chance at survival!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Rescue our friends! A bond among foes sworn with fists!

programme.title: Zoro and Luffy go head-to-head with Mother Nature, and Sanji’s rescue mission is bolstered by Franky’s allegiance – and the arrival of the mysterious Sniper King!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Smash the wave! Luffy and zoro use the strongest combo!

programme.title: Sniper King, a mysterious warrior from the island of snipers, lends a hand as Franky and Sanji try to fight their way to Robin.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A mysterious man appears?! His name is sniper king!

programme.title: Sanji mixes it up with a deranged cook, Franky dukes it out with the newest member of CP9, and the Sniper King gets creative in his attempt to reach Robin!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Showdown between cooks! Sanji vs. Ramen kenpo!

programme.title: Franky and Sanji continue to battle the thugs of CP9. Meanwhile, Luffy and the rest of the gang find themselves headed for a collision that could spell doom for everyone!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Zoro faces a fellow master of the blade, Sanji looks to end his fight against a rampaging ramen master, and Franky finally lands a big blow against his CP9 foe!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Clash! Demon-slasher zoro vs. Ship-slasher t-bone!

programme.title: The Sniper King hatches a daring escape plan, but the assassins of CP9 are more powerful than our heroes ever imagined. Meanwhile, Luffy and the gang run into a very familiar frog!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Scramble over robin! A cunning plan by sniper king!

programme.title: As their train approaches Enies Lobby, Franky’s kind words cut through Robin’s cold exterior. Luffy’s train is thrown off course, but the group gains a powerful new ally!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The judicial island! Full view of enies lobby!

programme.title: The Straw Hats hatch a plan to rescue Robin, but as usual, Luffy can’t wait to find a fight. Will his impulsive attack derail their mission?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Landing operations start! Charge in, straw hats!

programme.title: Luffy manages to reach the main island, but the Franky Family’s assault is stopped short by a couple of angry giants!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy cuts through! Big showdown on the judicial island!

programme.title: Luffy makes short work of a few hundred marines, the Franky Family takes down a giant, and the assassins of CP9 report back to Spandam!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Battle against giants! Open the second gate!

programme.title: Zoro’s quick thinking – and a little help from a giant frog – sends the sea train soaring into the sky on a collision course with armed guards and their canine companions!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Find a way out! Rocketman takes flight!

programme.title: Nami electrocutes the enemy with a Clima Tact attack, but the bad guys have the Straw Hats surrounded until the Franky Family shows up with a couple of sea monsters!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Catch up with luffy! The straw hats' all-out battle

programme.title: Zoro, Sanji, Nami, and Chopper try to catch up with their captain, Soge King is nowhere to be found, and Luffy runs head first into a battle with Blueno!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Robin betrayed! The motive of the world government!

programme.title: Luffy shows off his new strength in a brawl with Blueno, Soge King befriends a giant, and a hulking sea beast makes the ultimate sacrifice.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Give robin back! Luffy vs. Blueno!

programme.title: While Luffy continues his battle with Blueno, Soge King’s giant companions make their presence felt, and the assassins of CP9 experiment with Devil Fruits!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Don't stop! Hoist the counterattack signal!

programme.title: A blind Kingbull fights with his last breath to get the Straw Hats one step closer to their captain. Luffy kick his body into second gear to protect his friends from dangerous foes!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Almost to luffy! Gather at the courthouse plaza!

programme.title: Luffy batters a baffled Blueno with his powerful new fighting style, and the cowardly Spandam begins to panic at the sound of the Straw Hats approaching!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Everything is to protect my friends! Second gear activated!

programme.title: Luffy and his crew are finally reunited and ready to rescue Robin, but the raven-haired beauty remains reluctant to rejoin her former mates despite Franky’s urging.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Give us your answer, robin! The straw hats' outcry!

programme.title: Flash back to Robin’s days as a young girl, her dangerous pursuit of forbidden knowledge, and her encounter with a friendly giant.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Robin's past! The girl who was called a devil!

programme.title: Robin’s flashback continues with the heartbreaking arrival of her mother – and the government’s cruel and brutal invasion of a peaceful island!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Fated mother and daughter! The mother's name is olvia!

programme.title: Professor Clover reveals a startling and sinister theory about the World Government, Robin reunites with her mother, and a giant joins the fight!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The tragedy of ohara! The terror of the buster call!

programme.title: The painful story of Ohara – and Robin’s younger years – draws to a tragic close. Luffy declares war on the World Government, and Robin finally changes her tune!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Say you want to live! We are your friends!

programme.title: The Straw Hats are ready to begin the fight for Robin, but first, Luffy flashes back to memories of his childhood – and the man who made him want to become a pirate!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Jump towards the falls! Luffy's feelings!

programme.title: Zoro remembers the first time he met Luffy, and Usopp recalls the events that led him to join the Straw Hats!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The ways of men! Zoro's techniques, usopp's dream!

programme.title: Nami’s heartbreaking past – and Luffy’s epic battle with Arlong – are recalled in this flashback to the early days of the Straw Hats!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A bond of friendship woven by tears! Nami's world map!

programme.title: A flashback sheds light on how Sanji came to join the crew, and Chopper’s backstory is revealed through memories of a visit to a snow-covered island!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Parting builds a man's character! Sanji and chopper!

programme.title: A flashback reveals Robin’s motives for cooperating with CP9, Nami’s shocking discovery about the archaeologist’s past, and Luffy’s determination to save his friend!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Everything is for her friends! Robin in the darkness!

programme.title: Franky stands up to Spandam by destroying what the madman desires most, and the sound of the sea train spurs the Straw Hats to make a daring leap of faith!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I'm not gonna hand over the blueprints! Franky's decision!

programme.title: Luffy races to rescue Robin while the rest of the Straw Hats set off in search of the five keys needed to unlock the archaeologist!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Obtain the five keys! The straw hat pirates vs. Cp9!

programme.title: While Usopp and Zoro go head-to-head with a couple of animal assassins, Sanji teaches the most beautiful member of CP9 the secrets of making good tea!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Devil fruit powers! Kaku and jabra transform!

programme.title: 57 Seconds, (2024, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Josh Hutcherson and Morgan Freeman star in this heart-racing action thriller. Every second counts for a tech blogger who wields a time-altering device to seek revenge on a ruthless corporate empire and ignites a pulse-pounding battle for survival.

programme.title: Interstellar, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: From director Christopher Nolan (Inception) comes the story of ex-pilot Cooper (Matthew McConaughey), who must leave his family and Earth behind to lead an expedition beyond this galaxy to discover whether mankind has a future among the stars.

programme.title: Species, (1995, Science fiction)
programme.desc: She's beautiful, seductive, intelligent, and her charms could spell doom for the entire human race! Ben Kingsley, Forrest Whitaker, and Natasha Henstridge star in this adrenaline-charged sci-fi hit.

programme.title: Mad Max, (1980, Action)
programme.desc: Max and the gang's worlds converge when the gang wants Max as badly as he wants them, especially after they target him for the death of their former leader.

programme.title: Annihilation, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: A biologist and former solider (Natalie Portman) must lead a mission into a mysterious quarantine zone known as The Shimmer, a beautiful but deadly world of mutated landscapes and creatures that threatens all life on Earth. Also starring Oscar Isaac.

programme.title: Interstellar, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: From director Christopher Nolan (Inception) comes the story of ex-pilot Cooper (Matthew McConaughey), who must leave his family and Earth behind to lead an expedition beyond this galaxy to discover whether mankind has a future among the stars.

programme.title: Infinite, (2021, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Evan McCauley has skills he never learned and memories of places he has never visited. Self-medicated and on the brink of a mental breakdown, a secret group that call themselves Infinites come to his rescue, revealing that his memories are real.

programme.title: John Carpenter's Escape From L.A., (1996, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The man with the patch is back. Call him Snake. His job: wade through L.A.’s ruined landmarks to retrieve a doomsday device, with a wild assortment of friends, fiends and foes.

programme.title: Silver Canyon, (1951, Western)
programme.desc: Gene Autry and Pat Buttram are sent by the cavalry to bring in raiders who are interfering with supply lines. Gene traces them to a small Army outpost where the outlaws set out to ravage the town.

programme.title: Valley Of Fire, (1951, Western)
programme.desc: Gene Autry is the new mayor of a lawless town. He has to rid the town of its gambling king and to import a group of gals to settle the men. Gene must out-gun renegades who want to kidnap the gals.

programme.title: Buffalo Bill And The Indians, (1976, Western)
programme.desc: Buffalo Bill has fought Indians & Civil War battles, but nothing can prepare him for show business! When he signs Sitting Bull for a role in his Wild West Show, the clash of cultures reverberates far beyond the boundaries of their sprawling theater.

programme.title: Along Came Jones, (1945, Western)
programme.desc: Gary Cooper gives a marvelous, tongue-in-cheek performance as a fumble-fingered cowpoke who is mistaken for a notorious bandit and almost gets killed by both sides of the law...all while managing to capture the attention of Loretta Young.

programme.title: Man of the West, (1958, Western)
programme.desc: Screen legend Gary Cooper demonstrates why he will always be remembered as one of the most authentic stars of the screen. Capable yet vulnerable, Cooper's portrayal of a former outlaw whose past returns to haunt him ranks among his very best.

programme.title: Quigley Down Under, (1990, Drama)
programme.desc: A self-assured American sharpshooter moves to Australia in search of employment and finds work for a despotic land baron in the Australian outback.

programme.title: Little Big Man, (1970, Western)
programme.desc: From director Arthur Penn (BONNIE AND CLYDE), Dustin Hoffman, Chief Dan George, Faye Dunaway, Martin Balsam, Jeff Corey and Richard Mulligan star in a genre-defying tale of an alleged 121-year-old white survivor of Custer's Last Stand.

programme.title: Pioneer Woman, (1973, Western)
programme.desc: In this powerful tale of courage, determination, and the pioneering spirit that defined an era, a young woman bravely sets out with her children in tow to claim a homestead - and a brand new life - in the untamed West after her husband is killed.

programme.title: Cattle Annie And Little Britches, (1981, Drama)
programme.desc: Two young aspiring outlaws (Amanda Plummer and Diane Lane) manage to join what’s left of the Doolin-Dalton gang, led by the aging Bill Doolin (Burt Lancaster). The gang’s heyday may be far behind them, but there’s still plenty of adventure left!

programme.title: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days, (2003, Romance)
programme.desc: A "How to..." columnist agrees to write a first-hand account about what it takes to drive a man out of your life... in exactly 10 days.

programme.title: Catch and Release, (2007, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Gray Wheeler just lost everything. But it could be the best thing that ever happened to her. After the death of her fiancé, Gray moves in with her late love's best friends. While Sam and Dennis do their best to cheer Gray up. Rated: PG-13

programme.title: Two Can Play That Game, (2001, Romance)
programme.desc: A sassy, confident woman must use all her wiles to have any hope of bringing her man back...while keeping her pride intact.

programme.title: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days, (2003, Romance)
programme.desc: A "How to..." columnist agrees to write a first-hand account about what it takes to drive a man out of your life... in exactly 10 days.

programme.title: Sydney White, (2007, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: A modern retelling of Snow White set against students in their freshman year of college in the greek system.

programme.title: Across the Universe, (2007, Musical)
programme.desc: A love story about a British boy and an American girl set against the backdrop of the social upheaval of the 1960s.

programme.title: Stomp The Yard, (2007, Musical)
programme.desc: DJ hasn't been in college for a day before he's entranced by a lovely co-ed, April. After joining an official step group, DJ must balance rehearsals, work, and school, while at the same time winning the heart of the girl of his dreams.

programme.title: Stomp the Yard: Homecoming, (2010, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: In the countdown to a national step-off, rivalries at Truth University run red-hot. The Theta Nus are counting on new pledge Chance Harris (Collins Pennie) to lead the team to victory. But he's too caught up in his own problems to focus. Rating: PG-13

programme.title: Daryl and Carol investigate the whereabouts of their friends after Pamela disappears them from the Commonwealth; Pamela asks Yumiko to prosecute Eugene on behalf of the Commonwealth.

programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Rui is a talented tennis player but Naru has noticed a dark change in her. Worried about their classmate, Naru and Usagi go to investigate.
programme.sub-title: A New Enemy Appears: Nephrite's Evil Crest

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Ami brings Usagi and Rei to her favorite park. Rei decides to have a date with Mamoru at the park before it closes down.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Juban District is having a contest to decide who can design the best wedding dress. Usagi, Rei, and all the girls in town compete.
programme.sub-title: A Girl's Dream: Usagi Becomes a Bride

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A photographer named Kijin Shinokawa holds a modeling contest. All the girls who have entered begin disappearing after Shinokawa photographs them!
programme.sub-title: Usagi's a Model: The Flash of the Monster Camera

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Shingo’s friend Mika gives him a doll but Shingo unintentionally breaks the doll and hurts Mika’s feelings. Shingo decides to apologize.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi receives a love letter from Tuxedo Mask, stating that he’d like to meet her. She finds out that all the girls in town received the same letter.
programme.sub-title: Usagi's Joy: A Love Letter from Tuxedo Mask

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The girls search for a vacation spot so they can focus on training. Instead, they settle on a mansion that has a very eerie service staff.
programme.sub-title: The Summer, the Beach, Youth and Ghosts

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Ami spots Nephrite and follows him to an animation studio that is making the Sailor V movie. Ami calls Usagi and Rei so they can investigate.
programme.sub-title: Protect the Children's Dreams: Friendship Through Anime

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Kingdom of Diamonds is hosting a party to reveal their treasure to the world. Both the Sailor Guardians and the Dark Kingdom crash the party.
programme.sub-title: Romance Under the Moon: Usagi's First Kiss

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Naru has fallen in love with Masato Sanjoin. Knowing that Sanjoin is really Nephrite, Usagi tries to convince Naru to give up on her feelings.
programme.sub-title: Wish upon a Star: Naru's First Love

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Nephrite uncovers Sailor Moon’s identity as Usagi. His attempt to finish her off is cut short when he learns that Naru has been kidnapped by Zoisite.
programme.sub-title: Naru's Tears: Nephrite Dies for Love

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A new girl named Makoto Kino transfers to Usagi’s school, but her tough attitude seems to scare everyone away. Usagi quickly becomes friends with her.
programme.sub-title: Jupiter, the Powerful Girl in Love

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Sailor Guardians grow in strength with its newest member Sailor Jupiter joining the team. Sailor Moon is appointed as team leader.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi learns that a transfer student named Ryo Urawa seems to have a crush on Ami, and tries to help him out.
programme.sub-title: Crushing on Ami: The Boy Who Can See the Future

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Naru attend an art exhibit by Yumemi Yumeno. Usagi and Mamoru are both asked by Yumemi to become models for her latest painting.
programme.sub-title: The Painting of Love: Usagi and Mamoru Get Closer

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Makoto discover Motoki has a girlfriend named Reika. His relationship is in jeopardy due to Reika’s chance to study abroad.
programme.sub-title: Total Chaos: The Messy Love Rectangle

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Grandpa Hino has become emotionally unstable, causing Rei to worry. The new apprentice Yuichiro tries to cheer her up.
programme.sub-title: Grandpa Loses Control: Rei in Danger

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and friends meet a girl who they believe holds the final Rainbow Crystal. But they realize it’s her pet cat that possesses the Rainbow Crystal!
programme.sub-title: Loved and Chased: Luna's Worst Day Ever

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Umino seems to have fallen in love with Naru. Naru only considers Umino a friend, so Usagi decides to play Cupid and urges them to go on a date.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: When the exploits of a Sailor Moon imposter become quite the sensation, the real Sailor Guardians step in to investigate.
programme.sub-title: Enter Venus, the Last Sailor Guardian

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Now that Sailor Venus has joined the team, all of the Sailor Guardians are finally together! Zoisite has discovered that Tuxedo Mask is Mamoru Chiba.
programme.sub-title: The Shining Silver Crystal: The Moon Princess Appears

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Tuxedo Mask is wounded while protecting Sailor Moon. The seven Rainbow Crystals gather and she is transformed into Serenity.
programme.sub-title: Returning Memories: Usagi and Mamoru's Past

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi is haunted by dreams of Tuxedo Mask, who has been abducted by the Dark Kingdom. Minako takes Usagi to a popular hair salon hoping it will help.
programme.sub-title: Usagi's Confusion: Is Tuxedo Mask Evil?

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi decides to take the Princess Seminar course and the other Sailor Guardians join her. This is actually a trap set up by the Dark Kingdom.

programme.title: Perigo na Montanha, (2018)
programme.desc: 2018. Joe Braven é um lenhador humilde que vive na fronteira dos Estados Unidos. Quando ele é assaltado por um grupo de traficantes de drogas na cabana isolada onde ele mora, ele fará tudo o que puder para proteger sua família. Gêneros: Thriller Elenco: Jason Momoa, Garret Dillahunt, Jill Wagner, Glenn Ennis, Todd Scott, Stephen Lang, Sasha Rossof, Sala Baker, Fraser Aitcheson, Teach Grant Diretor: Lin Oeding

programme.title: Guerra nas ruas, (1969)

programme.title: Ruslan-Vingança Explosiva, (2009)
programme.desc: 2009. Ruslan Drachev é um ex-gangster que agora escreve romances criminais baseados em suas experiências. programme.title: Carga Explosiva 3, (2008)
programme.desc: 2008. Frank Martin é obrigado a conduzir Valentina, a filha de Leonid Vasilev, o chefe da Agência de Proteção Ambiental da Ucrânia, de Marselha a Odessa, além de dois sacos de conteúdo suspeito. programme.title: Ritmo Quente, (2002)
programme.desc: 2002. De 17 anos, está de férias com sua família em um resort nas montanhas, quando ela é atraída para os alojamentos dos funcionários, ouvindo música. Eles fariam um par perfeito, se não houvesse um problema: Robert gay. Gêneros: Romance Elenco: Madonna, Rupert Everett, Benjamin Bratt Diretor: John Schlesinger

programme.title: A Invasão - Ocupação Alienígena, (2021)
programme.desc: 2021. Dois anos após a aterrissagem de alienígenas na Terra, os sobreviventes de Sydney, Austrália, lutam em uma guerra desesperada enquanto o número de mortos continua a aumentar. Uma última batalha é a esperança da humanidade. programme.desc: 2015. Gêneros: Sci-Fi & Fantasy Elenco: Tom Berenger, Bernard Curry, Brooke Langton, Caitlyn Carver, Lew Temple Diretor: Rex Piano

programme.title: Mega Shark vs. Kolossus, (2015)
programme.desc: 2015. Quando um novo Mega Shark aparece, ele ameaça a economia global. programme.title: Davi e Golias, (2020)

Uma das batalhas mais lendárias da história é recontada em um conto de coragem e fé. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Matt Berberi, Michael Wayne Foster, John Knox | Diretor: Wallace Brothers

programme.title: Atormentado pelo passado, (2020)

Gêneros: Drama Elenco: Brittany Snow, William H. Macy, Tom Lipinski Diretor: Maggie Kiley

programme.title: A Luz Divina, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Sol Harkins é o ateu mais famoso do mundo. Por sua opinião sempre contundente e muitas vezes polêmica, ele alcançou vários fãs e odiadores. Ele sofre um grave acidente que o deixa à beira da morte e vê todas as suas convicções sendo testadas. Gêneros: Action & Adventure

programme.title: Ma ma, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Após ser diagnosticada com câncer de mama, Magda descobre estar grávida. Além de contar com o apoio de seu novo companheiro e do filho, ela acredita no poder de cura da menina que espera. Gêneros: Action & Adventure

programme.title: O Recomeço, (1970)

programme.desc: 2017. Na dinastia Ming, onde o jovem general Qi Jiguang conquista uma importante vitória contra os piratas japoneses, comandando o exército chinês. Quando, quatro anos depois, sua nação é mais uma vez atacada, Qi se vê obrigado a retornar aos campos de batalha. programme.title: Encontrando o Amor em Sugarcreek, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Pai e filho fugindo de uma tragédia chocante e brutal se instalam na cidade predominantemente amish de Sugarcreek, Ohio. Eles são acolhidos por três irmãs que oferecem ao pai um trabalho de faz-tudo, mas uma policial local começa a desconfiar. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.desc: 1970. O editor de um tablóide se envolve com a esposa do chefe e dono do jornal sensacionalista. Não satisfeito com as mudanças políticas do jornal e com a promoção de sua amante, ele decide então tomar as rédeas da situação e passa a chantagear seu chefe. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.desc: 1970. Margaret dirige uma agência de arquitetos em pleno crescimento. Ela recebe subitamente duas notícias: sua prima e grande amiga Susan morreu em um acidente de carro com o marido. No testamento, Susan e Hank deixam a guarda para ela. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Arriscando a Sorte, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Depois de viver por anos em Nova York com documentos falsos, Camilo Sanz recebe um aviso de deportação. Desesperado, ele pega dinheiro emprestado com um perigoso agiota do bairro para fazer um casamento falso com uma conhecida e evitar ser deportado. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Magia ao Luar, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Stanley é um mágico inglês que tem dedicado sua vida a revelar espiritualistas fraudulentos. Ele pretende descobrir se a jovem Sophie é mesmo médium. Quanto mais tempo Stanley passa com ela, mais ele se encanta, arriscando-se a apaixonar. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Um Porto Seguro, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Uma mulher misteriosa se muda para uma pequena cidade e recomeça sua vida. Apesar da moça estar determinada a não formar laços afetivos na nova cidade, ela não consegue cumprir esse objetivo e acaba levantando questionamentos sobre seu passado. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Obsessão Perigosa, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Mike está na casa dos 50 anos e sente que seu casamento está cada vez mais frio. Com a chegada de novos vizinhos, ele começa a observar a rotina do jovem casal. Após conhecer melhor Jenna, Mike passa a se relacionar secretamente com a jovem. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Estuários, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Dois amigos de infância, agora adultos, se reencontram e exploram sentimentos há muito tempo reprimidos um pelo outro. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.desc: 1970. Depois de uma provação angustiante nas montanhas, Jannicke acorda no hospital. Todos os seus amigos estão mortos. Ela anda por corredores escuros e acredita que foi deixada sozinha, mas o pesadelo ainda não terminou. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Enquanto Houver Esperança, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Angélica é uma adolescente de 16 anos que luta contra uma forma rara de câncer. E, enquanto seus pais batalham para custear seu tratamento e ganhar mais tempo de vida para a garota, ela se apaixona pela primeira vez. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: A História de Wim de A a Z, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Conheça a história do órfão Wim, um menino que quer muito ir à escola em vez de passar o tempo todo trabalhando forçadamente na fábrica da cidade. Com muita força de vontade, Wim consegue escapar e encontrar novos amigos. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: Faça um Desejo!, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Quatro crianças descobrem uma criatura mágica que concede desejos em uma viagem à praia. Elas só não imaginavam que o vizinho esquisitão da casa ao lado também está de olho nesses poderes. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: Meu Querido Elfo, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Uma mãe solteira compra um apartamento antigo, sem saber que uma criatura mítica, um elfo, vive no apartamento há séculos. Os novos donos da casa precisam fazer amizade com a criatura, cuja tarefa é justamente proteger o local de uma bruxa. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: Uma Aventura e Tanto, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. O cão vira-lata Pluto aparece de repente e muda a vida da família Davis, que está enfrentando tempos difíceis. Em pouco tempo, ele salva uma criança, traz conforto a um garoto doente e repara um relacionamento desgastado de pai e filho. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: Ma ma, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Após ser diagnosticada com câncer de mama, Magda descobre estar grávida. Além de contar com o apoio de seu novo companheiro e do filho, ela acredita no poder de cura da menina que espera. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: Perseguindo o Assassino, (1970)

programme.title: Guerra Biológica, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Wesley McLaren é um imunologista aposentado da CIA, que leva uma vida tranquila com sua filha em uma fazenda em Montana. Quando uma arma biológica é acionada espalhando um vírus letal, ele se vê forçado a criar uma vacina. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: Sobibor, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. O oficial soviético Alexander Pechersky organiza uma revolta e uma fuga em massa dos prisioneiros de Sobibor, um campo de extermínio, em outubro de 1943. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: Evidências de um Crime, (1970)

programme.title: Força Maior, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Durante as férias nos Alpes Suíços, uma família é surpreendida por uma avalanche de neve que se aproxima. Desesperado, o pai, Tomás, age impulsivamente e coloca em risco a segurança do seu casamento e também o relacionamento com seus filhos. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: A Bela e a Fera, (1970)

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Infiltração: O Covil Da Cobra! - T01E47
programme.desc: 2008. As equipes Kakashi e Guy chegam ao esconderijo dos akatsuki, mas são parados por uma barreira de cinco selos. Neji usa seu byakugan para localizar os selos e os ninjas destroem a barreira. Naruto tem uma visão chocante. A equipe Guy encara uma armadilha. programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Laços - T01E48

Forçado a seguir Naruto, Kakashi pede que vovó Chiyo e Sakura não façam nada precipitado. programme.sub-title: Escapando da Rede que se Aperta
programme.desc: 2020. Boruto e os outros se envolvem em um incidente no Castelo Fushuu, e além de serem taxados de criminosos, eles são perseguidos por uma gangue do País do Silêncio. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Vagner Fagundes, Diego Lima, Robson Kumode, Diego Marques, Úrsula Bezerra, Lucas Gama, Luiza Porto, Mariana Zink Diretor: Hiroyuki Yamashita

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - T01E163
programme.desc: 2020. A Equipe 7 e Mugino conseguem despistar a gangue e continuam a perseguir os culpados. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Vagner Fagundes, Diego Lima, Robson Kumode, Diego Marques, Úrsula Bezerra, Lucas Gama, Luiza Porto, Mariana Zink Diretor: Hiroyuki Yamashita

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Algo Importante... - T01E49
programme.desc: 2008. A luta entre avó e neto começa. Para derrotar o verdadeiro Sasori dentro do boneco, Hiruko deve ser destruído primeiro. Só a própria avó consegue entender as armadilhas complexas de Sasori, mas é Sakura que deve dar o golpe final. Que estratégia usarão? Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A História Do Álbum Ilustrado - T01E50
programme.desc: 2008. Chiyo e Sakura expõem Sasori, que não envelheceu nada nos últimos vinte anos. Chiyo fica mais chocada com o segundo boneco que Sasori revela. Sasori foi quem planejou o desaparecimento do kazecage. Uma equipe ninja se dirige a um certo local. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Reencontro - T01E51
programme.desc: 2008. Sakura fica cercada por uma nuvem de veneno e usa um papel bomba para se livrar da fumaça. Ela tenta capturar Sasori para forçá-lo a dar informações sobre Orochimaru, invocando dois bonecos para esta batalha. Naruto e Kakashi ainda perseguem Deidara! Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.desc: 2020. O País dos Pássaros está com problemas devido a um espectro conhecido como o Guerreiro Amaldiçoado, que muitos acreditam ser o fantasma do Senhor Owashi, o antigo senhor feudal que morreu de repente. Gêneros: Anime

programme.title: Naruto: O Plano Do Tático - T01E163

programme.title: 2008. De acordo com o acerto, Near e o SPK se encontram com Light e o corpo especial em um armazém. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Alexandre Drumond, Ana Lucia, Charles Manuel, Jorge Vasconcellos, José Leonardo, Sergio Cantu Diretor: Tetsuro Araki
programme.desc: Death Note - T01E36

programme.title: 2008. Embora Mikami tenha escrito os nomes de todos no Death Note, estavam vivos. Near consegue o Death Note e tudo é revelado. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Alexandre Drumond, Ana Lucia, Charles Manuel, Jorge Vasconcellos, José Leonardo, Sergio Cantu Diretor: Tetsuro Araki
programme.desc: Death Note - T01E37

programme.title: 2007. O brilhante, mas entediado estudante da escola Light Yagami encontra-se mantendo o poder da vida e da morte em suas mãos, o Death Note. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Alexandre Drumond, Ana Lucia, Charles Manuel, Jorge Vasconcellos, José Leonardo, Sergio Cantu Diretor: Tetsuro Araki
programme.desc: Death Note - T01E01

programme.desc: Death Note - T01E02

programme.title: 2007. Ryuk o Shinigami que deixou cair o Death Note no mundo humano, avisa a Light que alguém está no seu encalço. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Alexandre Drumond, Ana Lucia, Charles Manuel, Jorge Vasconcellos, José Leonardo, Sergio Cantu Diretor: Tetsuro Araki
programme.desc: Death Note - T01E03

programme.title: 2007. Light, conhecido mundialmente como Kira, prova a extensão dos poderes do Death Note. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Alexandre Drumond, Ana Lucia, Charles Manuel, Jorge Vasconcellos, José Leonardo, Sergio Cantu Diretor: Tetsuro Araki
programme.desc: Death Note - T01E04

programme.title: 2007. Soichiro Yagami exige uma reunião em pessoa com L quando ele descobre que ele secretamente levou agentes do FBI para o Japão. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Alexandre Drumond, Ana Lucia, Charles Manuel, Jorge Vasconcellos, José Leonardo, Sergio Cantu Diretor: Tetsuro Araki
programme.desc: Death Note - T01E05

programme.desc: Death Note - T01E07

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Impermanência - T02E60
programme.desc: 2008. Vovó Chiyo realiza o jutsu de ressuscitação em Gaara. Gaara acorda cercado por Naruto e os outros e também por uma multidão de ninjas da areia. Percebendo a verdade por trás do jutsu de ressuscitação, todos demonstram seu respeito por Chiyo. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Contato - T02E61
programme.desc: 2008. Gaara e seus salvadores retornam à Aldeia de Areia. Após visitar o túmulo de Vovó Chiyo, Naruto e os ninjas da Folha têm que partir. Deidara aparece ferido na frente de Zetsu e Tobi. Na Aldeia da Folha, alguém tenta infiltrar um garoto na equipe Kakashi! Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Companheiro De Equipe! - T02E62
programme.desc: 2008. Kakashi é hospitalizado devido à tensão causada por seu mangekyo sharinga. Apesar dos apelos de Shizune para enviar outra equipe, Tsunade afirma que enviará a equipe Kakashi para fazer o trabalho. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Os Dois Reis - T02E63
programme.desc: 2008. Sai diz que ele e Naruto se encontrarão de novo e desaparece. Homura e Koharu dizem a Tsunade que Naruto não deve ser enviado em missões envolvendo a Akatsuki. Tsunade não concorda, então eles exigem que ela adicione um ninja recomendado por Danzo. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Sinal De Fogo Preto - T02E64
programme.desc: 2008. Naruto fica enfurecido ao saber que Sai o atacou para testá-lo. Tsunade, Jiraiya, Yamatoe e Shizune se reunem no quarto de Kakashi. Jiraiya expõe o comportamento despreocupado de Naruto. Sai recebe um envelope misterioso do setor operacional da fundação. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Presa Na Escuridão - T02E65
programme.desc: 2008. A nova equipe Kakashi segue em direção à ponte Tenchi. Quando Sai mostra seu desprezo por Sasuke, o antagonismo com Naruto aumenta. Yamato decide que eles passarão a noite em uma pousada para tentar melhorar as relações entre os membros de sua equipe. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Almas Ressuscitadas - T02E66
programme.desc: 2008. Sakura vê Sai trabalhando em uma pintura abstrata e encontra um livro de desenhos incomum no meio das coisas dele. Enquanto vão em direção à ponte Tenchi, eles se mantêm atentos contra qualquer emboscada. Yamato orienta sua equipe caso uma luta aconteça. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden - T02E67
programme.desc: 2008. Yamato faz uma simulação para avaliar as habilidades e técnicas de luta da equipe Kakashi. Sai abandona Naruto para concluir a missão simulada. Naruto fica uma fera e declara que, se é para ajudar a salvar o Sasuke, ele ficará na mesma equipe que Sai. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Momento De Despertar - T02E68
programme.desc: 2008. O dia para capturar o espião finalmente chega. Yamato assume a aparência de Sasori e espera que o espião apareça. Para a surpresa de todos, o espião era Kabuto. De repente, Orochimaru aparece. A situação muda, e a equipe Kakashi se encontra em risco. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Desespero - T02E69
programme.desc: 2008. Ao enfrentar Orochimaru, Naruto liberta o poder da Raposa de Nove Caudas. Quando Yamato vê a quarta cauda, lembra do que Jiraiya falou. Yamato deveria suprimir o chakra que afetaria o corpo de Naruto. O ninjutsu secreto de Yamato se torna aparente. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Ressonância - T02E70
programme.desc: 2008. Quando a terceira cauda aparece, Naruto só consegue ver Orochimaru. Ele está cego até para seus companheiros de equipe. Sakura é atingida e cai inconsciente. Sai finalmente segue para sua missão secreta. Naruto libera a quarta cauda proibida. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Meu Amigo - T02E71
programme.desc: 2008. Naruto perde a consciência e é tomado por impulsos destrutivos. Os clones de Sai e Yamato testemunham uma batalha horrível entre Orochimaru e Naruto. O poder e a aparência de Naruto se tornam demoníacos, como se ele estivesse se transformando na Raposa. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Uma Ameaça Se Aproxima - T02E72
programme.desc: 2008. Naruto, mesmo transformado, não desiste de trazer Sasuke para casa. Sakura é ferida por Naruto, mas consegue usar seu ninjutsu para conter a agitação da Raposa de Nove Caudas. Orochimaru tenta deixar o campo de batalha, mas é confrontado por Sai. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Invasão Da Akatsuki - T02E73
programme.desc: 2008. Orochimaru aceita levar Sai para o esconderijo. Yamato consegue parar a agitação de Naruto, mas os ferimentos de Naruto são graves. Quando ele volta a si, Yamato revela a ele e Sakura que Sai foi embora e que Danzo pode estar conspirando algo terrível. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Sob O Céu Estrelado - T02E74
programme.desc: 2008. Naruto e sakura ficam chocados quando descobrem que Danzo planeja trabalhar com Orochimaru. A equipe Dakashi é forçada a fazer uma pausa. Orochimaru percebe que está sendo seguido pelo clone de Yamato e decide usar Sai para despistar seus perseguidores. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Oração Do Velho Monge - T02E75
programme.desc: 2008. Naruto fica chocado ao saber que foi o responsável pelos ferimentos de Sakura. Yamato diz que ele irá suprimir o poder da Raposa de Nove Caudas com seu ninjutsu. Sakura pergunta sobre uma história estranha que ela viu no livro de desenhos de Sai. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Próximo Passo - T02E76
programme.desc: 2008. Sai estremece quando encontra Sasuke no esconderijo de Orochimaru. Sai ficará com Orochimaru em troca de algumas informações valiosas, mas ficará sob prisão domiciliar até que possa ser de confiança. Quando fica sozinho, sai e começa a procurar um livro. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Escalada De Prata - T02E77
programme.desc: 2008. A equipe Kakashi consegue achar Sai. Eles começam a interrogá-lo sobre os planos de Danzo, e Sai conta tudo. Sakura descobre, através das atitudes de Sai, alguns pontos fortes em seu subconsciente e assinala para Sai as contradições em seu comportamento. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Julgamento - T02E78
programme.desc: 2008. Kabuto faz um ataque de surpresa na equipe Kakashi para levar Sai de volta. Com as informações que conseguem através de Kabuto, capturado, a procura por Sasuke está perto do fim. Naruto e Sakura correm para achar Sasuke. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Un Grito Interrompido - T02E79
programme.desc: 2008. Naruto procura por Sasuke. Sai lembra que teve um irmão mais velho e consegue terminar o retrato inacabado. Antes de desaparecer após um ataque de Orochimaru, Sai promete que salvará Sasuke. Yamato descobre uma verdade entre os pertences de Sai. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Últimas Palavras - T02E80
programme.desc: 2008. A equipe Kakashi fica chocada ao saber que a missão verdadeira de Sai é matar Sasuke. Sai alcança Sasuke - deve matá-lo ou salvá-lo? Sai e Sasuke se enfrentam, demolindo uma parte do esconderijo. Naruto e os outros encontram Sasuke. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Notícias Tristes - T02E81
programme.desc: 2008. A equipe Kakashi tem seu desejo atendido ao reencontrar Sasuke, mas Sasuke não mudou. Seu objetivo é se vingar de seu irmão mais velho, Itachi. Os impulsos da Raposa de Nove Caudas incitam Naruto, mas Sasuke usa seu sharingan para suprimir a raposa. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Equipe Dez - T02E82
programme.desc: 2008. O desejo de Sasuke por vingança continua firme. Naruto fica chateado quando percebe que fracassou mais uma vez em levar Sasuke para casa. Orochimaru tem mais ou menos seis meses até sua transferência. A equipe Kakashi faz uma nova promessa. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Alvo Na Mira! - T02E83
programme.desc: 2008. Kakashi e a equipe dez partem para deter o akatsuki. Tsunade considera a equipe dez de naruto com o respaldo ideal para a equipe dez e manda naruto aperfeiçoar seu novo jutsu em 24 horas. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Habilidades De Kakuzu - T02E84

When they spot the kidnappers car with the girl in the back seat, they desperately race against time to save her before its too late. Starring Hayden Panettiere, Tyler James Williams, Kevin Dunn.

programme.title: Aliens Abducted My Parents and Now I Feel Kinda Left Out
programme.desc: High school journalist Itsy befriends her space-obsessed neighbor Calvin. After he convinces her that his parents were abducted by aliens, together they concoct a plan to get them back. Starring Emma Tremblay, Jacob Buster, Will Forte.

programme.title: Johnny Cash: The Redemption of an American Icon
programme.desc: Depression and drug addiction leave Johnny Cash stumbling at the height of his career, but he rediscovers his faith. Featuring never-before-heard conversations with the Man in Black and interviews with country music stars.

programme.title: Mom vs. Matchmaker
programme.desc: Everyone takes a shot at finding puppy love for Aaron.

programme.title: Heartland Homicide
programme.desc: When Erin Chorney disappears, suspicion falls on her ex-boyfriend Michael Bridges, the last person to have seen her; after investigators searches come up empty-handed, they orchestrate an operation to woo Bridges into confessing her whereabouts.

programme.title: Heartland Homicide
programme.desc: On the outskirts of Nashville, Mich., Rodney Fanchers bullet-ridden body is found in a ditch; the hunt for a killer begins, pulling in police forces from across the state; as the case starts to turn cold, a startling confession emerges.

programme.title: Heartland Homicide
programme.desc: In the small community of Gormania, W.Va., Cathy Ford receives a mysterious phone call and is reported missing that same evening; a burnt car, blood-soaked trailer and a secret a?air all point to the idea that Cathy did not disappear willingly.

programme.title: Almost Unsolved Heists
programme.desc: In the sleepy town of Marlborough, where boredom and low pay fuel dreams of escape, a daring heist unfolds in the dead of night, sparking a high-stakes cat-and-mouse game between local detectives and an elusive international crime syndicate.

programme.title: ROMI
programme.desc: When a young woman on the run is forced to hide out at a smart home, she becomes terrorized by ROMI, its sinister digital assistant. Starring Alexa Barajas, Jocelyn Chugg, Juan Riedinger.

programme.title: This Place
programme.desc: Two women fall in love for the first time. As they grow closer, each must confront their family histories in unexpected ways while navigating multiple legacies of grief and love. Starring Devery Jacobs, Priya Guns, Janïsa Weekes.

programme.title: Please, After You

programme.title: One Way Mirror
programme.desc: Police questions Stephen after he speaks to news outlets about the search for a woman missing from his building; when Stephen appears to shut down completely, the challenge moves from looking for a confession to trying to get him to speak at all.

programme.title: One Way Mirror
programme.desc: Police brings in Sergeant Jeffrey Pelo for questioning after being identified prowling outside a young womans house in the middle of the night; adamant hes done nothing wrong, interrogators walk a tight rope questioning one of their own.

programme.title: What We Inherit
programme.desc: After discovering his ancestors were both pioneers and enslavers, Kacim journeys through the complexities of his American and Algerian heritage, confronting histories of conquest, slavery, and the weight of an inherited legacy.

programme.title: Dream Horse
programme.desc: The true story of Dream Alliance, an unlikely racehorse bred by bartender Jan Vokes. Starring Toni Collette, Damian Lewis, Owen Teale.

programme.desc: Rosie and Alex are best friends until Alexs family moves to America. They gamble everything to keep their love and friendship alive over the years and miles.

programme.desc: When Jenny (Katherine Heigl) decides to marry a woman (Alexis Bledel), her conventional family must accept who she is or risk losing her forever.

programme.title: Would You Rather (2012)
programme.desc: Iris (Brittany Snow) and seven other desperate people become trapped in Shepards (Jeffrey Combs) mansion. Shepard forces them to play a sadistic game for a large sum of money -- but the dilemmas become increasingly deadly.

programme.title: Shell (2024)
programme.desc: Desperate to reclaim her career, once-beloved actress Samantha Lake gets drawn into the glamorous world of wellness mogul Zoe Shannon, only to uncover a monstrous truth beneath the seemingly flawless surface.

programme.title: The Hours (2002)
programme.desc: The writings of Virginia Woolf (Nicole Kidman) affect a housewife (Julianne Moore) and emulate the life of a New Yorker (Meryl Streep) who is in love with a dying poet.

programme.title: Winter Spring Summer or Fall (2024)
programme.desc: Young Remi has her future figured out, until she meets Barnes, who lives for the moment and makes her question everything. As their love story unfolds, she faces a choice -- stick to her plan or risk it all for a life she never saw coming.

programme.title: Pretty Red Dress (2022)
programme.desc: The story of Travis, Candice and their daughter, Kenisha, and their relationships with the same red dress.

programme.title: Heatwave (2022)
programme.desc: A womans life takes an unexpected turn when she falls for her bosss wife. She must soon defend herself as she becomes entangled in a web of malice.

programme.title: Shell (2024)
programme.desc: Desperate to reclaim her career, once-beloved actress Samantha Lake gets drawn into the glamorous world of wellness mogul Zoe Shannon, only to uncover a monstrous truth beneath the seemingly flawless surface.

programme.title: The Reader (2008)
programme.desc: In postwar Germany, a teenager (David Kross) has a love affair with an older woman (Kate Winslet) who is hiding a terrible secret.

programme.title: Personal Shopper (2016)
programme.desc: A young American in Paris works as a personal shopper for a celebrity. She seems to have the ability to communicate with spirits, like her recently deceased twin brother. Soon, she starts to receive ambiguous messages from an unknown source.

programme.title: Cinema Paradiso (1988)
programme.desc: A Sicilian boy (Salvatore Cascio) discovers the movies with his local theaters projectionist (Philippe Noiret).

programme.title: Like Crazy (2011)
programme.desc: A young British woman (Felicity Jones) and her American lover (Anton Yelchin) struggle with a long-distance relationship after she is banned from the U.S. for overstaying her visa.

programme.title: Red Eye (2005)
programme.desc: A plane passenger (Cillian Murphy) forcibly involves his seatmate (Rachel McAdams) in a plot to assassinate a government official.

programme.title: Shes the Man (2006)
programme.desc: Romantic complications ensue when a student poses as her twin brother and replaces him at his boarding school.

programme.title: Marvins Room (1996)
programme.desc: A Florida leukemia patient (Diane Keaton) needs her sisters (Meryl Streep) bone marrow, but first they must end a 20-year feud.

programme.title: The English Patient (1996)
programme.desc: A Hungarian counts (Ralph Fiennes) fling with a British newlywed leads to tragedy in World War II North Africa.

programme.title: The Beldham (2024)
programme.desc: A struggling new mother fights a generations-old presence lurking within her familys home, threatening her safety, her sanity, and the life of her infant child.

programme.title: Raging Grace (2023)
programme.desc: Nothing is as it seems when an undocumented Filipina immigrant takes a job as a caretaker for a terminally ill man in a lavish home. She and her daughter soon become ensnared by a terrible secret that threatens to tear them apart.

programme.title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street (2007)
programme.sub-title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street (2007)
programme.desc: After serving time for a crime he did not commit, a vengeful barber (Johnny Depp) and his accomplice (Helena Bonham Carter) carve up unlucky customers and bake them in meat pies.

programme.title: Sound of Violence (2021)
programme.desc: A young killer experiences intense pleasure whenever she hears the sound of human pain.

programme.title: The Virgin Suicides (1999)
programme.desc: Men reminisce about intriguing sisters, whose parents (James Woods, Kathleen Turner) quarantined them after one of the five killed herself.

programme.title: Our Friend (2019)
programme.desc: After Nicole and Matthew receive life-altering news, the couple find unexpected support from their friend Dane, who puts his own life on hold to move into their family home.

programme.title: Alfie (2004)
programme.desc: A Londoner (Jude Law) continues his womanizing ways while working as a chauffeur in New York.

programme.title: Bridget Joness Baby (2016)
programme.desc: Befuddled mom-to-be Bridget Jones (Renee Zellweger) must figure out which of the two men (Colin Firth, Patrick Dempsey) in her life is the father of her child.

programme.title: A Single Man (2009)
programme.desc: Planning to commit suicide at the end of the day, a gay professor (Colin Firth) who recently lost his lover goes about his daily routine and visits with longtime friends.

programme.title: The Violent Heart (2020)
programme.desc: Long-buried secrets threaten to tear a couple apart.

programme.title: End of Sentence (2019)
programme.desc: After being released from prison, a young man reluctantly embarks on a journey with his estranged father to spread his mothers ashes in her native Ireland.

programme.title: Dead Man Walking (1995)
programme.desc: A nun helps a double murderer deal with his actions and prepare for his execution in a New Orleans prison.

programme.title: The House of Yes (1997)
programme.desc: A man (Josh Hamilton) and his fiancee (Tori Spelling) visit his warped clan, complete with dark mansion and incestuous twin sister (Parker Posey).

programme.title: Nobodys Fool (2018)
programme.desc: Wild child Tanya looks to her buttoned-up, by-the-book sister Danica to help her get back on her feet. As these polar opposites collide, Tanya soon discovers that Danicas picture-perfect life and boyfriend may not be what they seem.

programme.title: The First Wives Club (1996)
